title: Deviant
description: *RE-EDITED AS OF AUGUST 31 2014**Please be aware that this is a Dark Romance novel and deals with serious themes, including violence and murder*This story is the first part in a series, each approx. 30-40k words in length.SloaneI'm not proud of the things I've done.The things I've had to do.The things I've given away.but I'd give it all over again to find her.Even if i die trying,I have to find Alexis.ZethShe wants me to help her,But I won't.She wants me to save her sister,But I can't.She wants me to be her hero,But I'm not a good man.I am her damnation.
author: Callie Hart
